desc: The official US site of Jowissa. Shop fashionable Swiss Made watches for ladies and gents. We create elegant jewelry watches as well as minimalist design watches. They all have a case covering crystal with a reflective and shiny glass cut. The Facet line even resembles a real diamond cut. Hand assembled in Switzerland

layout.text: Make a statement on your wrist with Swiss Made watches featuring faceted-glass crystals and jewel-bright colors that wow
